thread.title: Angela Lee Proves The Future Is Now
thread.title_full: Angela Lee Proves The Future Is Now | Khmer Times | News Portal Cambodia |

author: Reuters
title: Angela Lee Proves The Future Is Now
text:
SINGAPORE (REUTERS) – In Singapore’s Angela Lee, Asian mixed martial arts may have found their cornerstone star for the next decade. For Lee, ONE: ODYSSEY OF CHAMPIONS was supposed to be a stern test of mixed martial arts skills. It proved to be anything but, as she made it look easy in a straightforward victory.
The Hawaiian of Singapore and Korean descent burst onto the scene when she made her professional debut last May, submitting her opponent in less than two minutes.
She had an equally impressive performance this time against Mona Samir, and if it wasn’t for the gutsiness of her Egyptian opponent, Lee may have finished her second fight just as quickly. Samir tried to stave off the assault with defense and even had a takedown of her own, but Lee was simply too proficient in the grappling arts and made it look easy by submitting Samir with a rear naked choke.
After the fight, Lee stated her desire to add to her winning streak, saying, “It feels amazing to come out of this fight victorious and I hope to fight again as soon as possible.” At just 19 and with Lee’s girl-next-door looks and bubbly personality it may not be long before the entertainment industry starts calling.
